animate_3D_curve.name: animate_3D_curve
animate_3D_curve.description: Create a animation of curves using a curve generating function.

animate_curve.name: animate_curve
animate_curve.description: Create a animation of curves using a curve generating function.

arc.name: arc
arc.description:
This function is a curve: a function from a fraction t to a point. The points lie on the right half of the unit circle. They start at Point (0,1) when t is

  1. When t is 0.5, they reach Point (1,0), when t is 1, they reach Point (0, -1).

b_of.name: b_of
b_of.description: Retrieves the blue component of a given Point.

connect_ends.name: connect_ends
connect_ends.description: This function is a binary Curve operator: It takes two Curves as arguments and returns a new Curve. The two Curves are combined by using the full first Curve for the first portion of the result and by using the full second Curve for the second portion of the result. The second Curve is translated such that its point at fraction 0 is the same as the Point of the first Curve at fraction 1.

connect_rigidly.name: connect_rigidly
connect_rigidly.description: This function is a binary Curve operator: It takes two Curves as arguments and returns a new Curve. The two Curves are combined by using the full first Curve for the first portion of the result and by using the full second Curve for the second portion of the result. The second Curve is not changed, and therefore there might be a big jump in the middle of the result Curve.

draw_3D_connected.name: draw_3D_connected
draw_3D_connected.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line. The parts between (0,0,0) and (1,1,1) of the resulting Drawing are shown within the unit cube.

draw_3D_connected_full_view.name: draw_3D_connected_full_view
draw_3D_connected_full_view.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line. The Drawing is translated and stretched/shrunk to show the full curve and maximize its width and height within the cube.

draw_3D_connected_full_view_proportional.name: draw_3D_connected_full_view_proportional
draw_3D_connected_full_view_proportional.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line. The Drawing is translated and scaled proportionally with its size maximized to fit entirely inside the cube.

draw_3D_points.name: draw_3D_points
draw_3D_points.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. The parts between (0,0,0) and (1,1,1) of the resulting Drawing are shown within the unit cube.

draw_3D_points_full_view.name: draw_3D_points_full_view
draw_3D_points_full_view.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. The Drawing is translated and stretched/shrunk to maximize its size to fit entirely inside the cube.

draw_3D_points_full_view_proportional.name: draw_3D_points_full_view_proportional
draw_3D_points_full_view_proportional.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. The Drawing is translated and scaled proportionally with its size maximized to fit entirely inside the cube.

draw_connected.name: draw_connected
draw_connected.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line. The parts between (0,0) and (1,1) of the resulting Drawing are shown in the window.

draw_connected_full_view.name: draw_connected_full_view
draw_connected_full_view.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line. The Drawing is translated and stretched/shrunk to show the full curve and maximize its width and height, with some padding.

draw_connected_full_view_proportional.name: draw_connected_full_view_proportional
draw_connected_full_view_proportional.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line. The Drawing is translated and scaled proportionally to show the full curve and maximize its size, with some padding.

draw_points.name: draw_points
draw_points.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. The parts between (0,0) and (1,1) of the resulting Drawing are shown in the window.

draw_points_full_view.name: draw_points_full_view
draw_points_full_view.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. The Drawing is translated and stretched/shrunk to show the full curve and maximize its width and height, with some padding.

draw_points_full_view_proportional.name: draw_points_full_view_proportional
draw_points_full_view_proportional.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. The Drawing is translated and scaled proportionally with its size maximized to fit entirely inside the window, with some padding.

g_of.name: g_of
g_of.description: Retrieves the green component of a given Point.

invert.name: invert
invert.description: This function is a Curve transformation: a function from a Curve to a Curve. The points of the result Curve are the same points as the points of the original Curve, but in reverse: The result Curve applied to 0 is the original Curve applied to 1 and vice versa.

make_3D_color_point.name: make_3D_color_point
make_3D_color_point.description: Makes a 3D color Point with given x, y and z coordinates, and RGB values ranging from 0 to 255. Any input lower than 0 for RGB will be rounded up to 0, and any input higher than 255 will be rounded down to 255.

make_3D_point.name: make_3D_point
make_3D_point.description: Makes a 3D Point with given x, y and z coordinates.

make_color_point.name: make_color_point
make_color_point.description: Makes a color Point with given x and y coordinates, and RGB values ranging from 0 to 255. Any input lower than 0 for RGB will be rounded up to 0, and any input higher than 255 will be rounded down to 255.

make_point.name: make_point
make_point.description: Makes a Point with given x and y coordinates.

put_in_standard_position.name: put_in_standard_position
put_in_standard_position.description: This function is a Curve transformation: It takes a Curve as argument and returns a new Curve, as follows. A Curve is in standard position if it starts at (0,0) ends at (1,0). This function puts the given Curve in standard position by rigidly translating it so its start Point is at the origin (0,0), then rotating it about the origin to put its endpoint on the x axis, then scaling it to put the endpoint at (1,0). Behavior is unspecified on closed Curves where start-point equal end-point.

r_of.name: r_of
r_of.description: Retrieves the red component of a given Point.

rotate_around_origin.name: rotate_around_origin
rotate_around_origin.description: This function takes 3 angles, a, b and c in radians as parameter and returns a Curve transformation: a function that takes a Curve as argument and returns a new Curve, which is the original Curve rotated extrinsically with Euler angles (a, b, c) about x, y, and z axes.

scale.name: scale
scale.description: This function takes scaling factors a, b and c, as arguments and returns a Curve transformation that scales a given Curve by a in x-direction, b in y-direction and c in z-direction.

scale_proportional.name: scale_proportional
scale_proportional.description: This function takes a scaling factor s argument and returns a Curve transformation that scales a given Curve by s in x, y and z direction.

translate.name: translate
translate.description: This function returns a Curve transformation: It takes an x-value x0, a y-value y0 and a z-value z0, as arguments and returns a Curve transformation that takes a Curve as argument and returns a new Curve, by translating the original by x0 in x-direction, y0 in y-direction and z0 in z-direction.

unit_circle.name: unit_circle
unit_circle.description: This function is a curve: a function from a fraction t to a point. The points lie on the unit circle. They start at Point (1,0) when t is 0. When t is 0.25, they reach Point (0,1), when t is 0.5, they reach Point (-1, 0), etc.

unit_line.name: unit_line
unit_line.description: This function is a curve: a function from a fraction t to a point. The x-coordinate at fraction t is t, and the y-coordinate is 0.

unit_line_at.name: unit_line_at
unit_line_at.description: This function is a Curve generator: it takes a number and returns a horizontal curve. The number is a y-coordinate, and the Curve generates only points with the given y-coordinate.

x_of.name: x_of
x_of.description: Retrieves the x-coordinate of a given Point.

y_of.name: y_of
y_of.description: Retrieves the y-coordinate of a given Point.

z_of.name: z_of
z_of.description: Retrieves the z-coordinate of a given Point.
